thread.section_title: Colorado Pen Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Colorado Pen | www.coloradopen.com | 5 of 71
thread.title: TDS

author: TDS
title: TDS
text: I had previously had to find a refill for a roller ball pen I owned from a prior employer. It took awhile to find the Pelikan rollerball refill but I purchased three refills 2 years ago. This time I knew what I was looking for, although the cost was up a couple of dollars per refill from my last purchase. Still I enjoy the pen so I needed the refills. Service was timely and it arrived in good condition. So I am satisfied with this buying experience.
